title: Adani Green Energy becomes 8th most valued firm; overtakes Bajaj Finance, HDFC - The Financial Express
content: Adani Green Energy becomes 8th most valued firm; overtakes Bajaj Finance, HDFC  The Financial Express
description: Adani Green Energy commanded a market valuation of Rs 4,48,050.99 crore on BSE to take the eighth spot on the top-10 list.
